We provide hospitalization data by race/ethnicity for California
and North Carolina. 

Sources: 
California hospitalization rates: COVID-NET Laboratory-confirmed 
COVID-19 hospitalizations 
(https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/covidnetdashboard/de/powerb
i/dashboard.html). Note "Other" has been ommitted due to noise. 

North Carolina hospitalizations: North Carolina Department of Health
and Human Services Hospital Demographics 
(https://public.tableau.com/views/NCDHHS_COVID-19_DataDownload_Story_1
6220681778000/DataBehindtheDashboards?%3Aembed=y&%3AshowVizHome=no). 
Note a portion of hospitalizations are reported without known 
race/ethnicity.
